title: Weekly Roundup: Thursday, October 6
description: What's to expect in the next debate, and the latest battleground map. This episode: host/White House correspondent Tamara Keith, campaign reporter Sam Sanders, campaign reporter Asma Khalid, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
